statements: UPDATE credit_card_disputes SET dispute_amount = 150.75, dispute_status = 'Resolved' WHERE dispute_id = 101;
UPDATE credit_card_disputes SET merchant_id = 302, dispute_reason = 'Unauthorized Transaction' WHERE dispute_id = 202;
UPDATE credit_card_disputes SET dispute_status = 'Resolved', dispute_reason = 'Unauthorized transaction' WHERE dispute_id = 101 AND customer_id = 201;
UPDATE credit_card_disputes SET dispute_amount = 500.75, dispute_status = 'In Progress', dispute_reason = 'Billing error' WHERE merchant_id = 301 AND dispute_id = 102;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE merchants SET merchant_location = 'New York' WHERE merchant_name = 'ABC Corp';
UPDATE customers SET customer_name='Alice', customer_email='alice@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE merchants SET merchant_location='New York', merchant_name='Bob' WHERE merchant_id=2;
UPDATE CreditCardDisputes SET dispute_amount = 150.75, dispute_reason = 'Item not received' WHERE dispute_id = 101
UPDATE Customers SET address = '123 Main St, City, Country' WHERE customer_id = 201
UPDATE CreditCardDisputes SET dispute_amount = 500.00, dispute_reason = 'Product not as described' WHERE dispute_id = 101;
